titleStmt.title: A list of divers persons whose names are to be presented to the Kings Majestie, to dye without mercy. Also a declaration of the kingdoms of England and Scotland, for the vindication and defence of their religion, liberties, and laws. By the Honourable Houses of the Parliament of England, and the Honourable Convention of the Estates of the Kingdome of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Scotland. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: A list of divers persons whose names are to be presented to the Kings Majestie, to dye without mercy. Also a declaration of the kingdoms of England and Scotland, for the vindication and defence of their religion, liberties, and laws. By the Honourable Houses of the Parliament of England, and the Honourable Convention of the Estates of the Kingdome of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for V,V. and are to be sold at the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Not in fact by either the English and Welsh or the Scottish Parliaments.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
